column5: Does any one know whats been going on in Hamilton harbor for carp they spread out still or what?
They are in the midst of spawning. Some are spawned out and some are still plump with roe. That was a few days ago. Eastport, CCIW and Bayfront all have fish in them.
The Carp Barrier at Cootes has been the only steady fishing I've found, but that's more numbers than size.  Eastport & Inland Waters has been running hot or cold, and they've been damn finicky.
Earlier was real good but died off, but I haven't stopped by there in a couple of weeks.
